summary: Apple-inspired minimal e-commerce website with premium design, clean aesthetics, and full responsive layouts for desktop and mobile
architectural_notes: Apple-inspired minimal design: clean white/soft gray base, premium typography (Inter or SF Pro), large spacing, rounded corners, soft shadows
Fully responsive with separate desktop and mobile layouts (not scaled)
Smooth subtle animations for scroll and hover effects
Component-based architecture with clean, well-organized code
Maximum 2-3 colors, lots of white space, no heavy gradients or clutter
